name: int-ineqtransd
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c2))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c2, cle, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c2))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c2, cle, c1))

comment: InequalityTransitivity generator rule. (Contributed by Stanislas Polu, 7-Apr-2020.)
